XenotypeDef.label: rustkind
XenotypeDef.description:
Rustkinds are ageless super-humans powered by archotech-created archites in the bloodstream.
<color=#f5ffa2>Gameplay Effect (Food):</color> Instead of food, it should be charged at charging stations.
<color=#f5ffa2>Gameplay Effect (Switcher):</color> Can switch at any time to other xenotypes with the switcher gene.
